page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE(10Year old)
page.content: My name is {Erica Brown,}I live near {Coldeast}and I am 10 years old. On a normal Saturday morning I get up at about 8'o clock and put on my horse riding clothes. Then I go downstairs, brush my hair and go outside to feed my rabbit. After I have fed him I go inside and have my breakfast. For breakfast I have coco pops,they are a popular breakfast cereal at the moment. At about 8:30 my mum or dad get back from town and take my sister and I to the stables. The stables are called Smallacombe stables.We get there about 8:50 and go to groom the ponies. When we have finished we groom some of the horses and we go out for a ride at 10:00, we go out for an hour on the moor. When we come back my mum or dad take me home but my sister stays there all day. When I get home I go outside and play on the apple tree
